welcome.title: Welcome to Airport Squash
welcome.description: Discover first-class squash in a modern and welcoming environment

history.title: Our History
history.paragraph1: Since 2015, we have been your trusted partner for Squash and Fitness.
history.paragraph2: With state-of-the-art equipment and experienced trainers, we offer the best squash experience.
history.paragraph3: Our community is constantly growing and we are proud to connect people through sport.

community.title: Community
community.description: A place for meeting and sports

safety.title: Safety
safety.description: Your health is our top priority

join.title: Become part of our Community
join.description: Experience squash at the highest level

booking.title: Online Booking
booking.description: Book your court easily and quickly
booking.bookingInstructions: Follow these simple steps to book your court

cancellation.title: Cancellation
cancellation.rule1: Free cancellation up to 24 hours in advance

student.title: Membership via Urban Sports Club
student.feature1: Membership S: 4 visits per month, fitness training only, squash not included
student.feature2: Membership M: 8 visits per month, up to 4 squash sessions of 45 minutes each
student.feature3: Memberships L and XL: 8 visits per month, up to 8 squash sessions of 45 minutes each

holidayHours.title: Holidays
holidayHours.description: We are closed on the following holidays

success.title: Message Sent!
success.message: Thank you for your message. We will get back to you shortly.

errors.name: Please enter your name
errors.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
errors.subject: Please select a subject

directions.title: Directions
directions.public: By public transport: U7 subway to Kurt-Schumacher-Platz

events.title: Events & Community
events.communityDescription: At Airport Squash & Fitness, we believe in building a strong, inclusive community through sport. Our regular events are suitable for all ages and skill levels, offering opportunities to learn, connect, and play squash together.

social.title: Squash Juniors – Sundays
social.description: Whether you're a beginner or have already been on the court, our youth training engages children of all skill levels and age groups.

youth.title: Squash Airport Night Social Party
youth.description: Special training sessions for young players aged 8 to 16. Professional coaching in a fun and supportive environment. Equipment is provided for beginners.

inclusive.title: We're looking for a new team member.
inclusive.description: Be part of the team! Are you over 18, have experience as a bartender, and are available for 15 hours a week? Apply now to seize your opportunity.

getInvolved.title: Get Involved
getInvolved.description: Want to participate in our community events or learn more about our programs? Contact us or visit us during one of our events – we look forward to welcoming you to our squash family!

getInvolved.title: Get Involved
getInvolved.description: Want to participate in our community events or learn more about our programs? Contact us or visit us during one of our events - we look forward to welcoming you to our squash family!

shop.title: Online Shop
shop.description: Discover our range of courses, memberships, and training packages

welcome.title: Online Shopping at Airport Squash
welcome.description: Explore our selection of training packages, courses, and memberships. Start your squash journey or take your game to the next level with our professional services.

introductory.title: Introductory Course
introductory.description: Perfect for beginners! Learn the basics of squash with our experienced coaches. Includes 3 sessions and basic equipment.

youth.title: Youth Training Package
youth.description: Special training program for young athletes aged 8-16. Monthly package includes 8 sessions with professional coaching.

premium.title: Premium Membership
premium.description: Get unlimited access to our facilities, priority booking, and exclusive member benefits for 3 months.

help.title: Need help choosing?
help.description: Not sure which package is right for you? Our team is happy to help you find the perfect solution for your goals and level.

fitness.title: Fitness Center
fitness.description: Transform body and mind in our state-of-the-art fitness facility

welcome.title: Welcome to Airport Fitness
welcome.description: Our gym offers a wide range of activities and equipment to help you achieve your fitness goals. Whether you're just starting out or want to take your training to the next level, our experienced trainers and state-of-the-art equipment will support you.

general.title: General Training
general.description: Our fully equipped gym features modern cardio machines, free weights, and areas dedicated to strength training. Perfect for beginners and experienced athletes alike.

kickboxing.title: Kickboxing
kickboxing.description: High-intensity kickboxing classes that combine martial arts techniques with cardio. Improve your strength, agility, and confidence.

circuit.title: Circuit Training
circuit.description: Dynamic group workouts targeting all major muscle groups. Our circuit training sessions are designed to increase endurance and burn calories.

trial.title: Try a Free Session
trial.description: Experience our fitness center firsthand with a free trial session. Our trainers will help you discover the perfect activities for your fitness goals.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: We take the protection of your personal data seriously

declaration.title: Privacy Declaration
declaration.content: This privacy policy informs you about the nature, scope and purpose of the processing of personal data within our online services.

responsible.title: Responsible Entity
responsible.content:
Airport Squash & Fitness
Rue Charles Calmette 11D
13405 Berlin
Germany

collection.title: Data Collection
collection.content: We only collect and process personal data within the framework of applicable data protection laws. This includes name, contact information, and booking details.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, rectify, delete and restrict the processing of your personal data.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.intro: Please read these terms and conditions carefully

general.title: General Terms
general.content: These terms and conditions govern the contractual relationship between Airport Squash & Fitness and our customers.

membership.title: Membership
membership.content: Membership is personal and non-transferable. The minimum term is 1 month.

bookings.title: Bookings & Cancellations
bookings.content: Bookings can be cancelled free of charge up to 24 hours before play. Later cancellations incur a 50% fee.

rules.title: House Rules
rules.content: All members are required to comply with the house rules. These are displayed on the premises.
